name: Funky Boxers
overview: Funky Boxers is the latest one in the Victory Boxing series of boxing games for the Playstation One console. The main characters are the same from previous games in the series. Funky Boxers lets the player enter the ring and bout with a motley collection of boxers who range the spectrum of pugilistic prowess. The game features 18 different characters (8 of them are playable from the beginning of the game). Game modes: - Main Event: Sort of a career mode, you can train with your coach to learn new movements and then fights against different computer opponents to win the championship. - Exhibition: Compete in a one only fight agains another human player or the computer.
